msbt.message: The little game we played earlier was rather fun, wasn't it? Here's your prize, as promised. Feel free to eat the fruit, or plant it, or wear it as a hat! Whatever floats your boat, darling. It's all yours!
I had so much fun yesterday! I should have known you'd be aces at that game! Before I forget, I'm sending you the prize. I have more fruit ready and waiting, so let's play again soon, darling!
Here's that fruit I couldn't give you earlier, and a card to go with it. That game was fun, wasn't it? I must say, playing games with you was quite exciting. What can I say...I'm a thrill seeker!
